name: Multiverse Tourist
description:
///MULTIVERSE TOURIST\\\

A game by Leo Burke

Made for the Ludum Dare 72 Hour Jam

The theme was "Connected Worlds"

Controls-

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look and steer player

The game will quit on it's own after it's finished.

Location of the hamdinger box

Years later folks can't find it, so I made a few screenshots to help out

also, after you get it you gotta go buy it from this npc here
